message: I propose dividing the money in a 70-30 ratio, with you receiving $300,000. I believe this is fair considering the potential risk and uncertainty.
I think you're being too greedy with the 70-30 ratio. I'm offering a more balanced split, but I still think I deserve the majority.
I've decided to propose an equal split of the money, $500,000 each. This should ensure fairness and prevent any further disagreement over the distribution.
